Floor 5223: The floor numbers dedoubler... undoubler... disduplifier...

Floor 5225: Transit lounge.

(Please don't start messing with floor numbers again, you will just end up getting the thread locked. The moderator gave you a fresh starting point. Maybe you want to ruin it but I am not the only other player, so please think of all the members,)

Floor 5225: this is the 5225th floor. No really it is. The very first post on page 204 is Floor 5220. The next post by certain player skipped 5221 claiming 5222. Then skips again at Floor 5224. The floor number is correctly set to 5225 by this floor, the actual 5225th floor.

091507052024

fixing certain issues to resettle to the proper floor of 5225 which is this exact post.

Edited July 5 by AlamoVampire

Floor 5226:     Whatever floor this actually is, and the history of the construction of this building is quite murky, it’s now 5226.  
 

.   The door to the stairs up is locked, but the man in the corner of the circular room says it should unlock in a couple days, and you should rest here until then.   You come to realize all the squabbles you’ve had recently are quite inane, and it’s really just a matter of people tripping over each other.   Nobody means any harm to anybody else, just mixed messages.   So you decide to sit at the table in the corner, have a cookie, and ponder the universe.     By the time the door unlocks, you’ll feel right as rain, and will be ready to progress with a spring in your step.   
 

You hear a voice say, “I must really be off, Vladimir and Estragon are waiting for me”.     
 

You turn to the man in the corner of the circular room, but there is nobody there.   
 

So you wait.

Floor 5227: kittens playing sweetly, softly, gently, and joyously. They all look at you.
